Class Troop

java.lang.Object
com.github.StarcraftButGood.game.Troop
All Implemented Interfaces:

Direct Known Subclasses:

Represents the parent Troop class.

  • Constructor Details

    • Troop

      public Troop(float health, float damage, float speed, double range, float cost, SinglePlayerGame game, com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector3 loc, Player p)
      Constructor, makes a troop object.
      Parameters:
      health - health of troop
      damage - damage of troop
      speed - speed of troop
      range - range of troop
      cost - cost of troop
      game - game troop is in
      loc - location of troop
      p - player troop belongs to
